name: streamystats
tagline: An analytics dashboard for Twitch streamers
description: StreamyStats is a self-hosted analytics dashboard for Twitch streamers, aggregating stream data into charts and performance insights.

features.title: REST API
features.description: Aggregates stream statistics from Twitch API

features.title: Viewer Trends
features.description: Charts viewer counts and peak viewership over time

features.title: Follower Growth
features.description: Tracks follower count changes and growth rate

features.title: Stream Schedule
features.description: Displays streaming frequency and consistency metrics

features.title: Chat Activity
features.description: Analyzes chat message volume and engagement

features.title: Clip Tracking
features.description: Monitors most popular clips and their view counts

features.title: Subscriber Stats
features.description: Tracks subscriber counts and subscription trends

features.title: Revenue Estimates
features.description: Calculates estimated earnings from subs and bits
